00035 float OrthoCamera::GenerateRay(const Sample &sample,
00036                                Ray *ray) const {
00037         // Generate raster and camera samples
00038         Point Pras(sample.imageX, sample.imageY, 0);
00039         Point Pcamera;
00040         RasterToCamera(Pras, &Pcamera);
00041         ray->o = Pcamera;
00042         ray->d = Vector(0,0,1);
00043         // Set ray time value
00044         ray->time = Lerp(sample.time, ShutterOpen, ShutterClose);
00045         // Modify ray for depth of field
00046         if (LensRadius > 0.) {
00047                 // Sample point on lens
00048                 float lensU, lensV;
00049                 ConcentricSampleDisk(sample.lensU, sample.lensV,
00050                                      &lensU, &lensV);
00051                 lensU *= LensRadius;
00052                 lensV *= LensRadius;
00053                 // Compute point on plane of focus
00054                 float ft = (FocalDistance - ClipHither) / ray->d.z;
00055                 Point Pfocus = (*ray)(ft);
00056                 // Update ray for effect of lens
00057                 ray->o.x += lensU;
00058                 ray->o.y += lensV;
00059                 ray->d = Pfocus - ray->o;
00060         }
00061         ray->mint = 0.;
00062         ray->maxt = ClipYon - ClipHither;
00063         ray->d = Normalize(ray->d);
00064         CameraToWorld(*ray, ray);
00065         return 1.f;
00066 }
00067 extern "C" DLLEXPORT Camera *CreateCamera(const ParamSet &params,
00068                 const Transform &world2cam, Film *film) {
00069         // Extract common camera parameters from _ParamSet_
00070         float hither = max(1e-4f, params.FindOneFloat("hither", 1e-3f));
00071         float yon = min(params.FindOneFloat("yon", 1e30f), 1e30f);
00072         float shutteropen = params.FindOneFloat("shutteropen", 0.f);
00073         float shutterclose = params.FindOneFloat("shutterclose", 1.f);
00074         float lensradius = params.FindOneFloat("lensradius", 0.f);
00075         float focaldistance = params.FindOneFloat("focaldistance", 1e30f);
00076         float frame = params.FindOneFloat("frameaspectratio",
00077                 float(film->xResolution)/float(film->yResolution));
00078         float screen[4];
00079         if (frame > 1.f) {
00080                 screen[0] = -frame;
00081                 screen[1] =  frame;
00082                 screen[2] = -1.f;
00083                 screen[3] =  1.f;
00084         }
00085         else {
00086                 screen[0] = -1.f;
00087                 screen[1] =  1.f;
00088                 screen[2] = -1.f / frame;
00089                 screen[3] =  1.f / frame;
00090         }
00091         int swi;
00092         const float *sw = params.FindFloat("screenwindow", &swi);
00093         if (sw && swi == 4)
00094                 memcpy(screen, sw, 4*sizeof(float));
00095         return new OrthoCamera(world2cam, screen, hither, yon,
00096                 shutteropen, shutterclose, lensradius, focaldistance,
00097                 film);
00098 }
